En.NINETALES_PA1_TEXT_1: Causes snow to fall on an enemy, dealing damage to it and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for .75s. Boosted attacks, Snow Warning, and all moves (except Aurora Veil) sling snow; hitting the same target with snow 4 times will freeze them for 1s. This ability has an 8s cooldown.
En.NINETALES_BA1_TEXT_1: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_POWDER_SNOW_TEXT_1: Ninetales attacks with a chilly gust of powdery snow; dealing damage to enemies and slowing them by 50% for 1s.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_AVALANCHE_TEXT_1: Ninetales attacks with a gust of chilly ice toward the designated direction. The ice damages enemies and forms a wall that can't be walked through. After a short time, this wall melts and collapses; further damaging enemies in a radius around the wall.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_AVALANCHE_TEXT_2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies by 50% for 1s when this move hits.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_DAZZLING_GLEAM_TEXT_1: Ninetales attacks with a powerful cone of blinding light; damaging and stunning enemies hit for .8s.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_DAZZLING_GLEAM_TEXT_2: Increased damage and stun duration to 1s.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_ICY_WIND_TEXT_1: Ninetales attacks with a gust of freezing air; damaging, shoving, and slowing enemies hit.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_BLIZZARD_TEXT_1: Ninetales blasts twice in a line. The first blast penetrates walls and slows enemies. The second blast deals double damage, shoves enemies back, and if it hits a wall it creates a frost area at the impact location for 4s; dealing damage every 0.5s and slowing enemies in the area by 20% for 1s on each tick.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_BLIZZARD_TAG_TEXT_1: Deals twice the damage of the first hit.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_BLIZZARD_TAG_TEXT_2: Deals twice the damage of the first hit.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_AURORA_VEIL_TEXT_1: Ninetales dashes a short distance and creates an aurora centered on their position for 5s; reducing damage received by Ninetales and allies within the veil by 30%, healing Ninetales with each boosted attack, and increasing Attack Speed by 15%. While Ninetales is inside the aurora, movement speed is increased by 10% and all auto attacks are boosted.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_AURORA_VEIL_TEXT_2: Damage reduction increased to 35% and cooldown reduced by 2s.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_SNOW_GLOBE_TEXT_1: Attack with a chilly blast of snow and ice; dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect around Ninetales when it hits. Deals increased damage to enemies that are frozen.
En.NINETALES_MOVE_SNOW_GLOBE_TEXT_2: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

Cn.NINETALES_PA1_TEXT_1: 使冰雪落在敌人身上，对其造成伤害并使其移动速度降低 30%，持续 0.75 秒。在使用强化普通攻击或「极光幕」以外的招式进行攻击时会投掷雪花，一个目标身上的雪花累积 4 个时，会将其冻结 1 秒。此特性有 8 秒的间隔时间。
Cn.NINETALES_BA1_TEXT_1: 第三次普通攻击为强化普通攻击，命中时会对周围的敌人造成伤害并在短时间内降低其移动速度。
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_POWDER_SNOW_TEXT_1: 吹出冰冷的气息进行攻击，对敌人造成伤害并使其减速 50%，持续 1 秒。
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_AVALANCHE_TEXT_1: 用一阵寒冰向指定方向攻击。寒冰会伤害敌人并形成一堵无法穿过的墙。片刻之后，这堵墙融化倒塌，进一步对墙周围的敌人造成伤害。
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_AVALANCHE_TEXT_2: 招式命中时还会降低敌人的移动速度 50%，持续 1 秒。
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_DAZZLING_GLEAM_TEXT_1: 发射扇形的强光进行攻击，伤害并击晕敌人 0.8 秒。
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_DAZZLING_GLEAM_TEXT_2: 增加伤害，眩晕持续时间增加到 1 秒。
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_ICY_WIND_TEXT_1: 吹出结冰的冷气进行攻击。对范围内的敌人造成伤害，并在短时间内降低敌人的移动速度。此外，还将击退距离自己较近的敌人
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_BLIZZARD_TEXT_1: 向前方刮出两轮暴风雪进行攻击。第一轮暴风雪会穿透墙壁并减慢敌人的速度。第二轮暴风雪造成双倍伤害，并将敌人击退，如果它击中墙壁，它会在撞击位置产生一个冰霜区域，持续 4 秒；该区域每 0.5 秒造成一次伤害，且每次伤害会使敌人减速 20%，持续 1 秒。
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_BLIZZARD_TAG_TEXT_1: 伤害为第一轮暴风雪的两倍。
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_BLIZZARD_TAG_TEXT_2: 伤害为第一轮暴风雪的两倍。
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_AURORA_VEIL_TEXT_1:
跳向指定地点，并以其位置为中心制造极光，持续 5 秒；自身和极光内的友方宝可梦受到的伤害降低 30%。
    在极光范围内还会提高自身的移动速度10%，每次普通攻击都将变为强化普通攻击，攻击速度也会提高 15%。用强化普通攻击造成伤害时，会回复自身体力。
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_AURORA_VEIL_TEXT_2: 减伤增加至 35%，间隔时间减少 2 秒。
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_SNOW_GLOBE_TEXT_1: 用寒冷的冰雪攻击。命中时对范围内的敌人造成伤害。对被冻结的敌人造成更高的伤害。
Cn.NINETALES_MOVE_SNOW_GLOBE_TEXT_2: 30% 移动速度，30% 冷却缩减，20% 最大体力值护盾
